title: Cracked Heart: Poetic Thoughts on a Life:
description: The best fodder for the muse are lifeâ€™s events and circumstances.Situations mold us, forcing us to grow, and making us strong, even if we would have chosen an easier path. For the author, writing has become a way of reflecting on life, a chance to process experiences, and an avenue for healing. Inside these pages you'll Get a copy today and use rhythm and rhyme to discover our commonalities and your uniqueness!
author: Michele Venne
